p: We then calculated the additional economic effect of the nonlinear PCF and SAF relative to the legacy values (Fig. 5b). The nonlinear PCF leads to statistically significant increases in C NPV at the 5% significance level for all the scenarios considered, especially the NDC and BaU. The nonlinear correction to the SAF leads to small but statistically significant increases in C NPV for Zero Emissions and 1.5 °C, 2.0 °C and 2.5 °C target scenarios, statistically significant decreases in C NPV for NDCs Partial and BaU, and is not significant for NDCs (all at the 5% level).
